query:
select * from 
 (select GW, team, sum(total_points) as tot_points from data group by GW, team) pivot(min(tot_points) for GW in (1, 2, 3,4,5,6,7,8)) order by team;
select * from (select GW, position, max(total_points) as tot_points from data group by GW, position) pivot(min(tot_points) for GW in (1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8)) order by position;

with init as (select *, rank() over(partition by position order by tot_points desc) as rank from (select name, position, sum(total_points) as tot_points from data group by name, position order by name, position) order by tot_points desc) select name, position, tot_points from init where rank = 1 and position != 'GK'
